effect.short: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.full: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavorTexts.text:
The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance.
This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and
Speed stats.
